Question 4
  Found [char] with compatible type.
  Failure: [char] is incorrect.
    When applied to the following argument:
    
     | '\n'
    it produces the following invalid result:
    [Char '\n'] A valid result is:
    
     | HardLine

  Success 1: [^^] seems correct.
